item.title: HTML5 canvas绘图
item.description: HTML5 canvas画图 示例1 <!DOCTYPE html> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <script src="https://libs.baidu.com/jquery/2.0.3/jquery.min.js"></script> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="style.css" /> <title>Backpropagation</title> </head> <body>spr <div> <div style="float:right;margin-right:400px;margin-top:100px;width:300px;height:500px"> <span id="NN"></span> <span id="xyText"></span><br> <input id="Text"></input><br> <button id="clear" type="button" onclick="Clear()">
